message.body: At work till 10. And sick. Blah. Enjoy the flick!
Sorry to hear. Well give a call when you have some energy, it takes a bit to keep upp with me these days!
Free whiskey at franklin mortgage at 6 appeal to anyone?
:-( work till ten
Sounding great! what time?
8 ish! Yay!
Heading up nowww
Cominggg
We're recording tonight, sawwy :-( give luvv to the west for me
Cool, might not be going out anyway, turns out will is gonna be living with travis so im gonna hang out for a minute there
Sweet!
Wassup? Workin tonight?
Actually just brainstorming for a cafe to sit down and do some writing at
Ai! I'm headed to a bday party in s phila if you change yr mind! Have good writin's!
Maybe... Just reading the new philly edition of the onion, learned that eugene mirman was performing tonight, and that almst did
Whoa! sounds cant miss
I know, right??
Hey im gonna come around 1030, should i bring anything? like a pineapple?
Sure!!
Haha cool
Eddie! Where are you ???
Hey buddy, just outta work. You wanna meet soon?
Gonna drive over, got the bike rack so i can haul yrs home after.. Meet ihouse 645ish?
Hey buds, im seeing some chinese mummies at penn museum if anyone wants to join... Last night.. Open till 9... Radness... Might be able to get you in freeee
Oh nice, I hear those are awesome.... I'm under a water bear rock, if I can crawl out soon I'll ring ya!
Come, i wanna hear about water bears in creepy surroundings!
Gotta solve the mystery of how to kill a scientist first!
Poison poops in his waffles
But then I gotta get a waffle maker!
And some poison poop
Aw, that's easy
Yup, just now leaving the rock. Sorry :-(
Yea what are you up to? might stop at the marvelous and see if music is still happening
Gotta apply for a grant and go grocery shopping.... Dude, I have been under a lot of rocks lately, but am almost back to normal and will have fun times again soon!
Yea i hear ya. I wanna see your water bears when yr thru
Yes! I will send you tonight!
Whoa hope it doesnt give me poison poops
It is actually made entirely of poison poops actually
OH NOOOOOoooo
(fart)
Where are the space bears?
Oy. Bears headed yr way. Wanna karaoke tonight?0
Nah im gonna skip karaoke, doing some writing instead
Ha, now yr the rock dweller :-)
Yea, its gonna be serious :)
Uh, you mean yours, rock crawler outer
Haha, I ain't no lady!
Not in west philly by any chance are ya? finishing up a rad night of writing at sattelite, and i wanna get a drink... i also have half a pumpkin whoopie pie
Nice! No, I'm at home going on my second roll of tp for the day.... Soooo congested. Just when I crawl outta my rock, I get sick. Lame. Enjoy the pie and don't forget supermoon!
Supermoon?
Biggest moon ever!
What? yr lying i dont even see it
Tonight is a supermoon, no lie! A "perigee" moon, bigger and brighter than any in 20 years!
Oh man, im a suck. Im gonna go home and clean my room
Wowza!!
Who wants to see elephant 6 reunion holiday surprise tour craziness, ft 14 peeps from neutral milk hotel, otc, of montreal, elf power, etc etc on thurs?
Whoa crazy, but I have a water bear read thru from 8:30 - 11 :-(
The only thing theyre missing is water bears :)
Hey if youve got the inclination that cser you sent my way is wandering around west philly now. Fair warning tho shes frustratingly passive
Aw, sorry! I'm working in upstate nj all day and then have wbis reading.... Good luck....
Haha, well im going to that elephant 6 show tonight, plus i have 4 hours of writing so shes the one you should be wishing it to
Sup tonight buddy? Wanna go have a drink?
No sweat, maybe around 10... got to write until 930 with no breaks!
Haha, yr a machine. I'll prob be home by then, but we hang soon!
Aight buddy :) maybe ill read your super long script instead
No, no breaks from writing!
But texting counts!
Wanna see the social network at the troc tonight?
Going to nj tonight but maybe we can figure out dinner tmrw, s philly style!
Cool, keep me posted!
Wanna go to a pizza party tonight?
What time?
Im done tutoring around 730, heading over after that, 9th and south
Ok, I think I can come after 8, depends on how much I get done now....
Ok duder
Agh, sweet baby Jesus, NOW I'm outside.....
Hey k i feel like you might know this... Wheres the weird foreign magazine cafe in west phl?
Um.....no idea what that is, sorry :-(
Well that text will remind me to go look for it and take you there!
Yea!! If you feel like hangin after work, I'm goin to a bratwurst filled cabaret
Aw i cant tonight, watching a penn law musical thing starring friends lil sister
Btw nora knew that place i was talking about... AVRIL 50 near 34 and sansom
Whoa im blown away! definitely!
Yaya!
Hey ken, im gonna bring my special lady friend if yr counting guests... she loves valerie
Yaya! Txs fer the heads up on the head count!
And i have a specialllll present for you :))
Zomg!!!!
Thats right!
Oh, I just love yr lady friend so! She is such a gem! Thanks for coming last night!
Aw thank you :)
Aw yaya thx!
Wanna hang west today? theres a show at marvelous at 9 for record store day
Si posible... I promised j i'd hang when he gets off at 6 so if he's down, I am! Maybe we could go all grab dinner/drinks stuff! Will keep ya posted...
Sounds good... If the rain stops. Or maybe ill drive
Hmm, not sure we's gonna make it....think we need lame old couple time.... Sorry :-(
Ok dawg
Uh, like passover?
But with more falafel
Haha. I wont be attending
Aww, well happy Passover!
Maybe we can do some leftovers tmrw night... Im gonna be bringing home a few
Awesome. I should be around!
Alright! :)
We havin leftover feast tonight? I can bring Valerie if you like!
Sounds great! come over whenever, i told people 8ish but ill be home earlier
Ok, I'll prolly be around then, I needa nap like none other
Hey buddy you got some plastic cups?
Yes, will bring!
Yay!
Hey buddy transmodern is next weekend, im gonna see if i can switch with someone for next sunday
Yes!!!! I am 100% down!!!
Are you working tonight?
No, hanging out with tiffany and her friends at nam phuong, going away style. Were prob going out after somewhere if you wanna come
Aw, give her a goodbye hug for me! I'm going to a pifa Edith Piaf cabaret at 10 if you wanna join! Can-can dancers and bottomless drink for $10!
Whoa that sounds great where is?
At the Wilma (broad and locust) I have funsavers so let me know how many to bring! Yay!
Ai! Sold out! You guys still hangin?
Yea, but we just went over to some girls house... if you want you can come, were hanging on a cool rooftop and i bought way too much cheap beer
Aw, not gonna make it :-(. Say bye for me!
I will, its pritty fun tho. First time i shotgunned a beer!
How late do you work today?
Almost out, then gotta jet! me and the missus are going to montreal this weekend!
Awesome! Was gonna stop by, but won't hold ya up! Have a good time!!!
Thanks i will! well resume our loverly dinners when i get back (and i still wanna hit up some ginger recipes)
Didja get Sunday off?
Couldnt get the time off. We can check out the pifa broad street fair tmrw tho when im outta workn
Wah! Ok, i'm down
When ya off today?
Prob 4ish, stop in if you wanna, were deeeeeaaad
Mmmk, will come by laters!
How was the cirque?
Checked the heat wraps, they dont recommend for sensitive skin :/
Aw, too bad
Wanna hang out with me at my house tmrw while i sort through my possessions and daydrink?
Gotta work til 3, then going to cat and will's for a bbq, you should come!
Of course ill be there :) actually decided to nightdrink and tidy up instead, so that works out, wanna do some writing tmrw
Cool cool, see ya tomorrow!
Still up for kinetic costume making? prob gonna head over a bit late, like 7
... I do not remember this....I don't think I was that drunk.....
Theyre making costumes for the sculpture derby up on hope st tonight. I got a text from elissa about it last night... Cmon ill give you a ride :)
Ok, only if I get my stuff prepped for tomorrow's class... Let me know when yr headed out!
Ok, i will... Prob around 7 ill get in touch
K
Heading up now, wanna come?
Btw im thinking party on fri 20 since that sat is kinetic sculpture day
Thor 3d later on friday nite??
Haha, I don't think my Peru budget allows for Thor... Sorrryyyy :-(.
Well sneak!
Hey whens the show? i thought 630, but deborah says the internet says 9!!
Not 630! They prob won't play till 10:30/11. You crazy.
That predrink is gonna be rough on my liver :)
You already pre drinkin? Craaaaazzzzzy
Uh, its 630 you workaholic
I kid!
What are you up to?
Headed west side soonish for supper, wanna join?
Aw, heading east with deborah and sang... Were coming back after tho!
See ya later then!
Sinergy thing at 6 (free), wanna go?
Sure do! im almost out of work so we can gear up before too
Coolcool
Dont forget to dress emo. Might even need to hook me up with a fauxhawk
Hey you up? me and will are up nearby
Sorry to miss ya! Whatcha up to this weekend?
Heya! just getting some viet with a bud, then back to pack, swing by if you wanna provide moral support :D
I'm having studio time for a while, maybe after...or swing by if you wanna make a rabbit!
Yo miss! i have in my possession a somewhat finished story and am ready to hang!
Heading up now
K!
Dinner/Valerie tonight?
Cannot, my parents are coming in around 8 and were gonna do some moving... Ill be back in philly weds or thurs, ill let you know!
Okey dokey!
Where ya at?
Whoa dude kinda feeling rough, taking a nap break at elissas for a bit
Aw....feel better...
You still around? im walkin back now
Yea! At beer tent
Sweet, ive still got my free ticket :) whats the intersection there?
Sudquehanna
Word up
Hey ken, if yr seeing yr cser before she leaves tell her the kiwi comp i was thinkin of is called Not Given Lightly!
Will do! Bon voyaaaaaaaggggeeeee!!!
Thank!
Hey there, im still down for exploring, but its gotta be after 1, still game?
I'm helping Humpage move! I can't! Sorry :-(
Arrright, say hi
Will do! I doubt we'll be done before you go, but will let you know if so!
Hey, i got some free time poolside tmrw, wanna chat? particularly about that story :))
Que hora?? Hope the poolside is treatin you right!
Actually it seems weve got an art tour to go on, but glad youve read it, ill try to give a call pick up if its convenient!
Have a minute to talk about my story?
Srry, at job interview
Good luck bud! well, ive got some am pool time tmrw too
Hey im coming to your show! ill call you tmrw
Woooooo!
Hey buddies, getting back to town 2NIGHT, come to fiume 10ish if you wanna hang
Ed! Wooo! Dunno if I can get out to Fiume tonight tho...gonna try!
Yea!
What's yr plan today?
Is movie still a go with the rain? We'll be at tranny til 10ish if ya wanna swing by!
Nah movie is off... ;( gonna head to kenz after this larry flynt thang at free library but mayyybeeee
Hey where exactly is this place?
Del. ave, I'm leaving from tranny around 7
Ok, isnt that when it starts? and where should we meet
Yes, but I only want to see sisterbrother, i've seen everything else. I guess meet on the boat?
Haha, ok, so wheres the boat. and i guess ill get there a bit earlier then so i can see it all
Don't know, I'm just riding my bike until I see a sailboat it's around penns landing....see ya there!
Haha ok!
Hey im heading down from cc around now... You headed down soon?
soonish
Like soon ill wait for you? ill be there in 20
And if u have a couple of cups on hand that would be magic
I do, and will be there in 30....ish
Hey! heading to philly right now, we hanging?
Yea, in rehearsal until 8:30 at tranny
Nice im getting around then
Hey im going to blind pig to meet my friend for a drink, wanna meet there?
Where is? Will leave in 20
Hey buddy buddy im heading up nowww
Yo! When you back in town? How should we get that theramin?
Hey im in town later on, you around? its my birthday tmrw and im collecting presents :D
Wooooooo birthday!!!!! Sorry I didn't get back to you last night, in rehearsal/studio til super late. Whatcha doin for birthday times?
Hey thanks. Well im going with parents for bday omelette, then up to hudson valley on a zen retreat... Should be great!
Ok, looking fwd to that! you owe me a beer!
Awesome! Let me know when yr back and I'll come out of my cave to celebrate!
Btw, my mom says the theramin isnt working... Ill take a look at it and let you know
K...Corey might be able to fix it, depending on the problem
Ok, ill bring it by next time!
Sweet!
Hey buddy, im in philly with my parents tonight... Meet to drop off the theramin?
Sure! I actually might be able to hang outside the studio too!!!!
Haha not me tho. Well, maybe for a half hour or so... Im driving my parents in and were going to eat with my aunt :] maybe 7 or 8 ill be able to swing by
Oh, ok! Well, just keep me posted!
Hey buddy almost done with my first burmese meal. Then ill drop my parents off and swing by you if that works
K!
At tranny? im heading up
For sure
I'm at dos havin a drink, can you stop by here?
Hey buddy im at deborahs if yr done play-ing, shed love to cu, and i would too
Would love to but hafta work at the stood :-(. Give her love for me
Mass text time, hanging in the city, who wants to come to the musee of mourning art with me?
Not a person until after show opens, sorry :-(
Okays ill be in to see it sometime after labor day
Good luck tonight ;)
Spans
Haha thats cuz yr always saying spanx!
Spanx! Fuck you auto correct
Or spans haha. I thought spanx was the fuck up!
Hey i wanna see yr play thurs, its not gonna be sold out is it?
Aww there goes my plans :( i hear its great, whens it playing next week?
Not happening this Thursday. Next thursday! Only today this week
Thanks! Mon, wed, thur, and Friday next week
Ay cool, ill try next monday
Hey what times the show monday? im there!
7! Yay!
South philly circle hope right? SEE YOU
Yes
YES
Btw meant to tell you that tris did an awesome keanu reeves... And i mean that in only my most fanboyest bill and ted admiration. Awesome job :)
Howd it go tonight?
Great! Thx fr yr help!
Hey buddy still got that free ticket for me? youve convinced me, cu soon
Yay
So whats about to happen is that traffics gonna let up and im gonna be like, why did i take that nap in thta parking lot?
Hey buddy, whatareyouup2
Fringe bar!!!!!!!!
Ruba club, txixt 4th and 5th on green ( just n of springy g)
Comin up!
Two people have asked me where you are, and i said yer coming... Shortly
Hey buddy! In payment for yr help yesterday, want to go see Drive? I'll buy ya a ticket!
Phones about but yea! where when?
Riverview at 3:20?
Ok! meet a few min earlier outsida there
Ok!
Can we actually do the pearl (n broad st) at 3:40 instead? Closer to mah house...
You gots it. Im at circle thrift north right now getting AWESOME STUFF
No these finds pale in comparison.
! More badminton sweaters??????
Upstairs
Hey did leah tell you about upstate ny? do you wanna come? trying to figure out how many need to stay with the cser i stayed with last time
Yea! I think so...can you send me dates/mire info? Leah said maybe she'd drive if jer wanted to go
Yea, I'm on BSL with 10,000 high school kids, can't pick up phone now....
Cool! I can't leave until 6 on the 14th and have to be back the morning of the 17th at 7am, so dunno if that works....
Yea that totally works! and i just got us a place to stay :)
Awesome!
So were on for sure for 14th pm - 16th? you and j?
Yes! Prolly not j, but can mindy come? (sorry bout flaky txting)
Alright, just gonna check with ms ghost tour... I told her it was only gonna be one friend, so im not sure
Will do!
Lemme know, s'cool either way
Hey buddy, cool if you dont invite mindy? might be a bit too many peeps
Ok, excited!
No prob, thx for checking. J is nit coming, FYI
Happy new year!
Thanks buddy!
Hey dude! anyway you can convince peter to donate his cornhole setup for the nights festivities? and see you soon?
Ps if its helpful ill drive to pick it up!
Werrrrrd!
Will try! I'll be there around 6:30!
Hey im here, not getting calls only vms and text :Â¿
Call me now! I'm on break
Hey k, selene says 6 is cool, but we might wanna bring a tent for a couple of us since the living rooms right next to one of the bedrooms
Lychee juice+tequila = the weinberg
Put some ginger in it! ;)
DID U POCKET DIAL ME?? well hey
Did not! And I'm sick, but maybe we can meet tomorrow for planins?
Im good for now, just ate a sandwich
You wants to eats?
K
Hey guys check for ticks when you get home, just found one bugger on me!
Do you want to be part of the Halloween thing I'm doing? They need guys to spit blood and recite some poems/songs with the group....
Would require some rehearsal time
Ok can i wear my tights?
You guys down for a ghost trip reunion at the eleanor friedberger show tmrw night at union transfer? also: wild flag (ex-sleater kinney and mary timony!)
Nice! and i think i mighta gotten my 5 dollars worth already so sure, tell me when to rehearse
Not sure about the tights! Or show....I have rehearsal, but if I get out early I might make it!
Cool! Will pass on info when home later!
Coming to the show tonight?
Nope, I have 2 rehearsals, and still feel sick :-(. Sorry. Enjoy!
I just handed a love letter to eleanor friedberger. Im all nervous haha
Haha i need that to happen! for my life!
Yaya! Awesome!!!
Ghostbite/friedberger tour '12!
Be the tour that you want to see in the world.
I think we did.... This weekend!!!!
Sorry, eleanors gonna take your place next time
4ever
Eleanor said she wants the bells tho :( haha jkjk
Why me???? Without my bells, ghostbite ain't nuthin!
She was kind of super sweet. I pushed thru the crowd and horsely yelled, eleanor!, handed her the note. she said thanks, i said great set. she said than
ks again. i ran away : >
She wants you to ring her bell!
The blossoming of true romance! That's wonderful! Whatcha write her?
I told her that shes one of the people "doing work" out there, the real work of creative types in our world, making people feel again. i also led with t
his salutation -- dearest of eleanors, sweetest of friedbergers
I hope she writes back! =]
Gah, too great!
Yea, you can hitch a ride in with me and my parents
Me tooooo! Oh hey, j and I are going to NYC on the 15th! That's when you fly out right?
Nah, flights at 3 pm
Oh awesome, will you have time to hang?
Hey! got cut from work early, gonna head to ritt with a beer wanna join?
Rehearsal :-( have fun!
You are missing some awwwwful comedy
And gaining tights. I win
No time to stop back by :-(. Occupy!!
Wish u were here :)
Hey buddy did i ever take my bike light back from ya?
I think so, if not, it's in mindy's car
Coo
Oh hehe found the light. Hows it going in phl? im working longwood tmrw morning, could stop by...
Jer has a show tomorrow at the tritone! Come!
Cool, i will!
Hey what times jer going on?
Round 10 I think
Werd
Hey i dont know if youve checked your vm but nora just called me... Her brother died and shes in ohio, i think youve got a crying message waiting for ya
I talked to her last week, didn't want to talk about it to anyone without asking her first. Glad she called you, she def needs friends right now.
Ok cool, she just told me she left you that sobbing vm but not that u talked, wanted to make sure you didnt miss it :)

Thx for checking! Yea, she called while I was at work...I was plannin on calling her tonight to check in as well. Man. I want her to just stay with us, or some friends for a while when she gets back...
Thats not a bad idea, im sure she could use the support... She might isolate herself otherwise just being the way she is
Das is my fear too ... :-/
What's the show status?
M and k: Harry and the hens at 8, valerie at 10? also can i invite peeps?
Invite away!
Ok, when should i tell peeps? and whats yr exact address?
Got it
We just watched tabloid, craziest move EVER
Awesome
Do you have eggs at yr house?
5 eggs enuf?
Sure!
Do you have simple syrup? Or sugar?
YEA
Traffic is redic, still on our way
Aw cool well be here
Hey buddy, hows the leg :( thx so much for the visit it was so nice, my parents loved it too. also just wanted to give you guys the heads up to check yo
urselves before bed, found 2 ticks!!
Yea, uh, have fun flossing kristinas body too... She said you were gonna "check her for ticks" in that way [leery smile]
Leg is fine! So glad we got to come out, and much live to yr parents...will check for ticks!
Haha dentist porno
What!?! I got no invite to do any such thing! Damnit!
But whyyyyy it no happen.....wah
Well, apparently making little sexy jokes about floss is cool with her, so now u know
Finally, an in. Thanks!
need a date for one of those fringe shows tmw? havent forgotten my fake bf responsibilities :)
Both of em! If you wanna join, I have an extra ticket to zero cost house, and would live for ya to come see the brat shoe too, yayay
yesss lets! when is first play? go to fracking west philly party after ?
Actually I messed up, only going to zero cost house at 10:30 pm, going to get Chinatown food first with Zac if you want to come? Round 8?
sure :)
Annnnnnd now I'm going to see a show at 8. So no dinner unless we do it at 7. I'll check
So! Gonna get drinks with Zac at 7 at the el bar, then Chris's show, then pig iron! Maybe we swing by pizza brain too?
sounds rad, talk to you in a bit
Cool
hey btw do you need any furniture? my aunt has some bureaus, tables, and a set of nice white upholstered sitting things we are looking for a home for :)
Won't be at el bar til 7:20, sorry, running behind
Me too :)
you close or should i meet you at the theater ?
hey i wanna stand in the aisle for yr show tonight :) or do you need some help?
Yessss all things
How early can you get there?
still in nyc so prob 7ish
Ok, well just come for after party, it would take too long to show you what to do. Thx tho! And we can try to squeeze you in if you wanna see it!
too bad... but yea squeeze me in! ill sro it
when you going fringe bar? just hanging westerly
11 I think? Gonna wander down to the parkway and look at the lights for a hot second
oh yea the lights, sounds weird :) might meet some people out here but its not happening yet so maybe ill come join after this greenline show?
K!
hey im heading towards your trajectory so if you see a skulking corolla thats me :)
my dowry! sorry im not helping :{ hows it going?
Good! Halfway done!
Heya! Can you send me yr parents address?
Thx!
how are the blueberries? you guys get some jersey details sorted? im seeing a football game sunday but will be back around 6
Frozen. But it's gawgeous here. We dunno for sure, but if we do get in tomorrow it won't be until 8 or 9 at least. We're waaaaaay up in Maine. I'll letcha know tomorrow!
cool!
We're just now leaving maine. Doubtful we'll make it tonight, maybe tomorrow? We'll keep you posted.
cool bring plenty of blueberries :)
They're all dead
bad luck with the fruits dating back to iminami (didnt know how to turn that into a joke)
Ha....ha...? Anyhoo, we are staying in providence tonight, will you be around during the day tomorrow?
hey cool, and for sure ;)
Looks like we'll be near freehold around 4
super cool
hey if you guys are hungry well have some pizzas
In Perth amboy
whooee
